name: A Tail of Arrows
description:
A rogue-like where you carry your inventory behind you.

Features:

  • Rats
  • Bomb crabs
  • Treasure
  • Inventories that are too big
  • Exploding

Controls:

  • WASD - move
  • Mouse Aim - look
  • Mouse Left - use item
  • Mouse Right - scroll inventory
  • Esc - pause
